name: Marco Polo Project
tag_list: crowd-sourcing, translation, chinese, mandarin, china, social, collaboration, collaborative-translation, digital-media, new-media, social-translation, not-for-profit, new-writing, new-china, education, english, french, spanish, italian, digital-magazine,
overview:
The Marco Polo Project is a not-for-profit website crowd-sourcing the translation of contemporary Chinese writing.

The Marco Polo Project is creating a new paradigm for ‘social translation’ = social media + collaboration + translation + learning + engaging content.

The Marco Polo Project is a web-based platform where people come together online to translate Chinese writing into other languages, collectively. It combines the functions of an online magazine, a social networking platform, and a language learning tool, running on the principle of cross-cultural collaboration. It also serves to revitalise the outmoded Western view of China by making new, fresh Chinese media accessible to the world.

The Marco Polo Project is a not-for-profit organisation.
